channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- Honor V10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- Honor V10

item.title: CVE-2020-1806|2024-08-04T06:46:30.950Z -- huawei -- honor%20v10
item.description: Huawei Honor V10 smartphones with versions earlier than 10.0.0.156(C00E156R2P4) has three out of bounds vulnerabilities. Certain driver program does not sufficiently validate certain parameters received, that would lead to several bytes out of bound read. Successful exploit may cause information disclosure or service abnormal. This is 3 out of 3 out of bounds vulnerabilities found. Different than CVE-2020-1804 and CVE-2020-1805.

item.title: CVE-2019-5295|2024-08-04T19:54:53.234Z -- huawei -- honor%20v10
item.description: Huawei Honor V10 smartphones versions earlier than Berkeley-AL20 9.0.0.125(C00E125R2P14T8) have an authorization bypass vulnerability. Due to improper authorization implementation logic, attackers can bypass certain authorization scopes of smart phones by performing specific operations. This vulnerability can be exploited to perform operations beyond the scope of authorization.

item.title: CVE-2020-1804|2024-08-04T06:46:30.926Z -- huawei -- honor%20v10
item.description: Huawei Honor V10 smartphones with versions earlier than 10.0.0.156(C00E156R2P4) has three out of bounds vulnerabilities. Certain driver program does not sufficiently validate certain parameters received, that would lead to several bytes out of bound read. Successful exploit may cause information disclosure or service abnormal. This is 1 out of 3 out of bounds vulnerabilities found. Different than CVE-2020-1805 and CVE-2020-1806.

item.title: CVE-2020-1805|2024-08-04T06:46:30.907Z -- huawei -- honor%20v10
item.description: Huawei Honor V10 smartphones with versions earlier than 10.0.0.156(C00E156R2P4) has three out of bounds vulnerabilities. Certain driver program does not sufficiently validate certain parameters received, that would lead to several bytes out of bound read. Successful exploit may cause information disclosure or service abnormal. This is 2 out of 3 out of bounds vulnerabilities found. Different than CVE-2020-1804 and CVE-2020-1806.
